name: pdf-annotation-service
description: A web-based service for uploading, annotating, and downloading PDF documents with AI-powered annotation capabilities powered by Groq.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd server && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate
